import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import moment from 'moment' import { ChatAltIcon, EyeIcon, ThumbUpIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import GuideOptions from '../guideOptions' export default function Guide({ user, id, title, content, creator, created, categoryId, setCategory, setGuides, guide }) { return (

{creator.username}

{moment().subtract(moment().diff(created.slice(0, -5))).calendar()}

{(creator.id === user.id || user.accountType === "ADMIN") &&
}

{title}

) }
